name: Akash Meena
position: Head of Edtech & DLP Division at Motion Education Pvt Ltd | Director at VRM Softcom Pvt Ltd | Strategic Consultant at VRM Vrindam Pvt Ltd |  | IIT Kharagpur '21
about: Driven by a relentless pursuit of excellence, I am a dynamic individual known for my strategic mindset, adaptability, and unwavering commitment to success. With diverse professional experiences, I thrive in challenging environments, where I leverage my analytical skills and leadership capabilities to drive innovation and foster collaboration. My proactive approach, coupled with a passion for continuous learning, empowers me to overcome obstacles and achieve tangible results, making a positive impact wherever I go.
